titleStmt.title: The firme foundation of Catholike religion, against the bottomles pitt of heresies wherin is shewed that only Catholiks shalbe saued, & that all heretikes of what sect so euer are excluded from the kingdome of heauen. Compyled by Iohn Caumont of Champany: and translated out of French into English, by Iohn Pauncefote the elder Esquyre, in the tyme of his banishement.
Du firmament des catholiques, contre l'abisme des heretiques. English.
titleStmt.author: Caumont, Jean de.

titleStmt.title: The firme foundation of Catholike religion, against the bottomles pitt of heresies wherin is shewed that only Catholiks shalbe saued, & that all heretikes of what sect so euer are excluded from the kingdome of heauen. Compyled by Iohn Caumont of Champany: and translated out of French into English, by Iohn Pauncefote the elder Esquyre, in the tyme of his banishement.
Du firmament des catholiques, contre l'abisme des heretiques. English.
titleStmt.author: Caumont, Jean de.
Pauncefote, John.

publicationStmt.date: M.D.LXXXXI. [1591] Cum gratia & priuileg. Reg. Maiest.

notesStmt.note: A translation of Jean de Caumont's: Du firmament des catholiques, contre l'abisme des heretiques.
A1r line 5 of text ends "Christians,". Variant: quire A in another setting; A1r line 5 of text ends "christiƒÅs, &".
